Web Site Design Outside Contractor

24 Apr 2006

The International Erosion Control Association (IECA), an educational non-profit organization, is soliciting proposals to redesign its existing web site to incorporate desired features, achieve the goals of the site, and promote the associationâ€™s brand image. This is a short term project for an outside contractor or agency. All work can be performed off-site. You can view the complete Request for Proposal at http://www.ieca.org/contactus/rfpsitedesign.doc. The existing web site is located at www.ieca.org.

Please contact Kimberly Walker at kimberly@ieca.org or +1 970-879-3010 with questions.
